articles.author: Ramishah Maruf
articles.title: Tesla’s ‘American-made’ cars won’t get hit as hard by the auto tariffs - CNN
articles.description: Just this week, Tesla boasted as anxieties swirled over tariffs on automobiles.
articles.content:
Just this week, Tesla boasted as anxieties swirled over tariffs on automobiles.
Btw, Teslas are the most American-made cars, the official Tesla account posted on X on Sunday.
Thats true, at least a… [+3976 chars]

articles.title: Liu ends U.S. drought, wins figure skating worlds - ESPN
articles.description: Alysa Liu dethroned three-time defending champion Kaori Sakamoto to become the first American women's figure skating world champion since 2006.
articles.content:
Mar 28, 2025, 10:21 PM ET
BOSTON -- Alysa Liu skated around the ice in disbelief, her golden dress shimmering in the lights of TD Garden, and the appreciative roar from a sellout crowd reminded her … [+4506 chars]

articles.author: Lolita Baldor
articles.title: US and Lithuanian forces struggle to drain swamp to recover 4 soldiers in submerged armored vehicle - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. and Lithuanian troops and authorities are struggling to drain a swampy area in Lithuania in ongoing efforts to recover four American Army soldiers who went missing three days ago and are warning that it will be a long operation. The soldiers’ armored veh…
